transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Hello.
Hello.
Executive: Haan, good afternoon. Haan, good afternoon, ma'am. 
Customer: Aapne unko kis ka number diya tha?
Executive: Ah, iska number toh abhi Garjara Satyanarayan ne toh abhi client ka number diya tha.
Customer: Woh bol rahe hain ki aapne unko koi message ya call nahi kiya hai.
Executive: Message nahi, call nahi kiya tha?
Customer: Ma'am, call reminder set for 3 p.m. 7th November, today onwards.
Executive: Haan, so?
Customer: Ah, meri baat aap apne client se, apne buyer se mat karaiye. Aapki company ke jo owner hain, to Joy sir, mujhe unse baat karni hai, kyunki unhone kal 90 clients ko call kiya tha, buyleads ya enquiry ke regarding, unhone help desk pe poocha hai, to mujhe unse baat karni hai.
Executive: Okay, okay, okay, okay, haan.
Customer: Woh bhi hain aapke aas paas?
Executive: Nahi, sir toh hai.
Customer: Haan toh meri baat kara dijiye unse. Okay, okay, okay, okay, okay.
Executive: Sir.
Executive: Haan, haan, kya usko?
Executive: Ek minute ruko. Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Haan, boliye.
Executive: Ah, yes sir, we have talked yesterday in the evening.
Customer: Yes, yes, yes.
Customer: Yes. So, I have discussed one lead with your employee. I don't know her name, his name.
Executive: Her name is Sreejita.
Customer: Sreejita? Haan, Sreejita. Sreejita, Sreejita. Yes. Okay. I talked to her and she consumed one lead of company locks. Garjara karke team hai unka.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Ah, he, she gave me buyer number also. I called that buyer. He said that, ah, aap unko koi message WhatsApp pe kar dijiye ya phir unko call kar lijiye. Maine abhi 3 baje ka unko reminder bhi lagaya hai.
Customer: Dhai, dhai month se unka ek hi aaya hai, yahi toh baat hai. Dhai month mein mere ko ek hi aaya hai, toh weekly toh 40 aana hai na, 34 aana hai weekly.
Executive: Out of that, mere ko dhai month mein ek hi aaya hai.
Executive: Weekly aap 34 consume kar sakte ho. Aapke paas balance hai 34 consume karne ka. Baki aane ko toh kitne bhi aa sakte hain.
Customer: Lekin, lekin woh dhai, dhai month mein ek hi aayega kya? Dhai month matlab adhai month mein ek hi aayega kya?
Executive: Nahi, nahi, aur bhi leads the, but woh dur ke the, Bihar ke the, Uttar Pradesh ke the. Toh woh toh mere ko nahi chahiye, mere ko WB ke andar chahiye na. Main kya kaam karne ke liye ready ho gaya, boliye.
Executive: Sahi keh rahi hoon. Ek din mein agar aap do teen lead karoge, ek din mein teen se char lead karoge consume, theek hai? Sir dekho, jaise ek baar aise morning mein call liya 9:00-10:00 baje, ek baar 12:00-1:00 baje, ek baar 3:00-4:00 baje, ek baar. Madam lead abhi tak toh aaya nahi, aane se toh main kar lega, lekin West Bengal mein aane dijiye, woh toh abhi tak nahi aaya kuch. Wahi baat hai.
Executive: Bhai, yeh jo inhone ki hai, yeh shayad Andhra Pradesh ki ki hai.
Customer: Madam, Andhra Pradesh ka kaam hum yaha se kaise karega na? Woh toh Andhra Pradesh jo baitha hai, wohi kaam kar sakta hai. Main yaha se kaise karega kaam?
Executive: Mujhe pata hai, lekin aapko jo direct enquiries wagera aa rahe hain na, aapka jo kaam hai, ah, matlab aap jo kaam kar rahe hain. Nahi, mere sath jo banda aaye the, baat hua tha, woh bola West Bengal ka hi hoga. Woh mere ko bilkul aisa hi bola tha, isliye main uske sath agreement kiya. Haan, haan, toh agar jaise aap location select karoge na, near by states ya woh, toh aapko wahi ki aayegi leads.
Customer: Kahan par aa raha hai, madam? Isliye toh main bol raha hoon. Accha, main ek meeting mein hoon abhi. Suniye, suniye, main ek meeting mein hoon. Main isi number mein call back kar sakta hoon aapko? Nahi, aapka koi dusra koi number hai? Main aapke sath detail mein baat kar sakta hoon. Madam, kal raat ko aapko diya tha ek number, shayad 777 wala. Ek number diye the. Haan, 777 wala, haan, number diye the. Usi mein kar sakte hain na humne?
Executive: Haan. Toh abhi aap. Main aadha ghante ke baad aapko call kar leta hoon. Isi number pe. Abhi aapne jo concern raise kiya tha, isko main close kar doon ya nahi? Nahi, close nahi hoga. Concern open rahega. Mere sath discuss hoga, uske baad hi close hoga. Kyunki abhi tak mere ko matter solve nahi hua. Theek hai? Toh. Main abhi meeting mein hoon. Main aapko aadha ghante ke baad phone kar leta hoon.
Executive: Toh aap ma'am ko call kar dijiye, Sreejita ma'am ko. Haan, theek hai.
Customer: Haan, boliye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to talk to Joy Sir. 

- Customer has received only one buylead in 2.5 months.

- Wants buyleads from West Bengal only.



Resolution:

- Executive connected the customer to Joy Sir.

- Explained customer can consume 34 leads weekly.

- Explained how to select specific locations for leads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back in 30 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, subscription, west bengal
